item.title: Interactive BOM
item.description: Interactive Bill of Materials # schematics 24/01/2021 commit d7be486 Full screen Open in a new page var button = document.getElementById("btn-e4c4d3451377ce48"); button.onclick = ()={ var elem = document.getElementById("ifm-e4c4d3451377ce48"); if (elem.requestFullscreen) { elem.requestFullscreen(); } else if (elem.webkitRequestFullscreen) { elem.webkitRequestFullscreen(); } else if (elem.msRequestFullscreen) { elem.msRequestFullscreen(); } };
